parameter.title: Start date
parameter.abstract: Start date of the TOI. Used as queryable for the MERIS Level 1 catalogue or data package (format ISO 8601 e.g. 2015-06-03T13:21:58Z)

parameter.title: End date
parameter.abstract: End date of the TOI. Used as queryable for the MERIS Level 1 catalogue or data package (format ISO 8601 e.g. 2015-06-03T13:21:58Z)

parameter.title: bandNames
parameter.abstract: Bands to process as a comma separated list (e.g. radiance_2,radiance_3)

parameter.title: Mask expression for the MERIS whole view
parameter.abstract: Mask expression for the whole MERIS view

parameter.title: Use ECMWF data in the MERIS ADS
parameter.abstract: Flag to use ECMWF data in the MERIS ADS (true or false)

parameter.title: List of POI for reflectance extraction
parameter.abstract: List of POIS (Name,Latitude,Longitude) separated by pipe (requires setting evaluate to true)

parameter.title: Side length of surrounding window (uneven)
parameter.abstract: The window size specifies the number of pixels surrounding the pixels derived from the given geographic coordinates to be exported

parameter.title: Pixel value aggregation method (with window size is larger than 1)
parameter.abstract: The aggregation methods that may be used are: min, exports the minimum of the window values; max, exports the maximum of the window values; mean, exports mean and standard deviation of the window values or median, exports the median of the window values

parameter.title: Flag to trigger the publishing of Level 2 products generated
parameter.abstract: Flag to trigger the publishing of Level 2 products generated

parameter.title: Flag to extract POI reflectances
parameter.abstract: Flag to extract POI reflectances for evaluation purposes

workflow.title: Participant C
workflow.abstract: Participant C uses the BEAM SmacOp atmospheric correction with ECMWF data
